content.p: Renowned industrial relevant research centre for sustainable palm oil research. We are focusing on research for the entire value chain of palm oil industry. Our mission is to develop best practice example of what can be achieved in the drive for sustainability in palm oil industry. Mission Objectives/ Projects Integrated Waste Recovery & Regeneration System (REGEN System) In collaboration with Eureka Synergy Sdn. Bhd. Integrated Anaerobic Aerobic Bioreactor (IAAB) Pilot Plant In collaboration and funded by Havys Oil Mill Sdn. Bhd. Improvement of Living Organic Fertilizer (LOF) and Fortified Living Organic Fertilizer (FLOF) to Control Basal Stem Rot Diseases in Oil Palm In collaboration and funded by Green Plant Organic Fertilizer Sdn. Bhd. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
